Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn. Spellcasting. The sage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks):At will: light, mage hand, mending3/day each: comprehend languages, detect magic, identify1/day each: dispel magic, levitate, locate object, see invisibility, sending, tongues, unseen servant
Reactions: Shield (1st-Level Spell; 3/Day). When the sage is hit by an attack or targeted by a magic missile spell, it calls forth an invisible barrier of magical force that protects it.
